title: Verasy
text:
Verasy (Belarusian: Верасы́) was a musical band created in Belarus (then Belarusian SSR, Soviet Union) in 1971. It was created under the Belarusian State Philarmony, Minsk, director and composer Vasily Rainchik. Verasy is Belarusian for heather (see Calluna).
In 2006 Rainchik created a band of the same name.


== Discography ==
1975 Where to Find Such Happiness
1976 Smells like Chabor
1978 White Birch
1978 Red Poppies
1979 Herbs of Childhood
1980 Our Discotheque
1980 Robins Hearing a Voice
1985 Music for All
